phrases: Follow-up after an interior STEMI where we had to put in another stent
No chest pain or shortness of breath
Bilateral leg swelling since being sent home from the hospital
Three over six systolic ejection murmur heard at the left base
Lower limb edema, pitting one plus
EKG shows normal sinus rhythm with evolutionary changes after STEMI
Reduced ejection fraction of thirty-five percent
Continue aspirin 81 mg daily, Brilinta 90 mg twice daily, Lipitor 80 mg daily, Toprol 50 mg daily
Refer to cardiac rehab for exercise confidence
Newly reduced left ventricular dysfunction and moderate mitral regurgitation
Prescribe Lasix 40 mg daily and Aldactone 12.5 mg daily for acute heart failure
Retain lisinopril 20 mg daily for hypertension and heart failure
Encourage diet changes, especially reducing preserved meats like pepperoni
Patient agrees to continue walking and monitoring diabetes with metformin
Patient understands and agrees with the treatment plan
